featureShowCase.highlightSearchResults: Quickly find areas with coffee shops that match your search

description.placeholder: Cat cafe with individual sockets and cozy seating

seo.home_title: Caffeing - Find Best Cafes in Taiwan | Must-Visit Coffee App
seo.home_description: Download the Caffeing app to discover Taiwan's best cafes: open now, classic, specialty, or unique themed spots. Find foreigner-friendly cafes, Wi-Fi & power outlets, and top recommendations from Google Maps, YouTube, & Instagram. Enjoy your perfect coffee time in Taiwan.
seo.contact_description: Have questions or feedback about Caffeing? Reach out to our team via email or social media. We're here to help!
seo.form_description: Submit your recommendation for a new coffee shop.
seo.privacy_description: Learn how Caffeing collects, uses, and protects your personal data, and understand your privacy rights.
